name: foxi-pro
title: Foxi Pro
desc: A Premium Template with superb performance and design, perfect for startups and SaaS websites, built with Astro & TailwindCSS.
article:
Foxi Pro is a premium template offering superior performance, extended features, and premium design. Ideal for startups and SaaS websites, now with extra pages and enhanced functionality, built with Astro & Tailwind CSS.

Last Updated

June 04, 2025

Key Features

  • 20+ pre-designed pages to build any website effortlessly.
  • i18n multilingual support for international audiences.
  • Perfect Scores in PageSpeed Insights: Achieve perfect 100s for both desktop and mobile performance *
  • SEO-friendly: Optimized for search engines to improve visibility and organic traffic.
  • Keystatic CMS for streamlined content management.
  • Built with Tailwind CSS: Powered by Tailwind CSS for rapid UI development and responsive design.
  • Light & Dark Mode Support: Seamlessly switch between light and dark themes to suit user preferences.
  • Mega Menu for complex navigation needs.
  • Stunning new Slider and Marquee components.
  • Video Popup for multimedia presentations.
  • Lottie File Integration for eye-catching animations.
  • Blog & E-guides Collection to organize and showcase your posts and downloadable resources.
  • Price Comparison Tables for detailed feature overviews.
  • Roadmap Page for planning and transparency.
  • Post Pagination for enhanced blog navigation.
  • Transparent Navigation for modern, sleek header designs.
  • Seamless integration with Web3Forms for dynamic form handling.
  • Integrated Analytics: Includes integrated Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager functionalities.
  • Sitemap XML: Includes a ready-made sitemap XML for search engine indexing.
  • 30+ reusable components to create your own stunning designs
  • Premium Support: Access exclusive support in our dedicated Discord channel for guidance and troubleshooting.

* Lighthouse score refers to the classic homepage


Pages:

  • Classic Home Page: A sleek, minimal landing page with a stunning design.
  • Video Popup Home Page: Showcase multimedia content with an elegant video modal.
  • Animated Home Page: Bring your site to life with eye-catching Lottie animations.
  • Home Page with Slider: Highlight key features or products with a dynamic slider.
  • Split Image Home Page: A modern layout showcasing contrasting visuals and text.
  • Pricing Tables Page: Clear and visually appealing pricing plans to convert visitors.
  • Features Page: Highlight your productâs core features with an engaging layout.
  • Features Page with Cards: Showcase features using clean, structured card designs.
  • Features Page with Lists: Present features or benefits in an easy-to-read list format.
  • Integrations Page: Detail your integrations with other tools and platforms.
  • Pricing Comparison Page: Compare plans side-by-side for transparency and clarity.
  • Blog Pages: A fully featured blog with support for categories and tags.
  • eGuides Page: Organize and showcase downloadable guides or resources.
  • Changelog Page: Keep your audience updated with release notes and improvements.
  • Roadmap Page: Share your projectâs vision and upcoming plans.
  • FAQ Page: Address common questions with a structured, user-friendly format.
  • Signup Page: Simplify user registration with a clean and inviting form.
  • Terms and Conditions Page: Include legal details for your site or product.
  • Contact Page: Provide users an easy way to reach you for inquiries or support


Want Custom Features?

Get in touch with us for any customization needs or inquiries. Contact us through email at info@oxygenna.com or join our community on Discord!
